meta.title: Golden Retriever Shedding: How to Manage the Fur
meta.description: Golden Retrievers shed a lot. Learn how to manage their double coat, reduce shedding, and keep your home clean.

intro.short_hook: Golden Retrievers shed a lot. Learn how to manage their double coat, reduce shedding, and keep your home clean.
intro.who_struggles_with_this: Owners of this breed often face this issue due to natural instincts.
